:::config { "language": "curl", "theme":"material-theme-palenight" }
curl https://api.stripe.com/v1/products baz \
  -u user:pass \
  -d "name"="Starter Dashboard"
  --flag1

# Comment

curl https://example.com/api/snap?token=YOUR_TOKEN_HERE&url=https://example.com

curl -H "Authorization: Bearer YOUR_TOKEN_HERE" http://testdomain.test/api/snap?url=https://example.com # [tl! highlight]

curl https://api.stripe.com/v1/billing_portal/configurations \
  -u sk_test_some_super_secret_but_awesome_api_key_here: \
  -d "business_profile[privacy_policy_url]"="https://example.com/privacy" \
  -d "business_profile[terms_of_service_url]"="https://example.com/terms" \
  -d "features[invoice_history][enabled]"=true

curl https://example.com/api/snap\
       ?token=YOUR_TOKEN_HERE\
       &url=https://example.com
:::expectation
